appDescription.message: Unofficial Sonos controller app for Chrome.
appDescription.description: Description of application in Chrome settings / extension page.

appDisclaimer.message: This is an unofficial implementation of the Sonos controller for Chrome. It is a free software project that is not affiliated with Sonos in any way.

noMediaGroupsShort.description: Short text to display when there are not SONOS devices detected.

musicTrack.description: Short label for displaying category or headline for a music track.

musicAlbum.description: Short label for displaying category or headline for a music album

musicArtist.description: Short label for displaying category or headline for a music artist
